name: VoiceofPersonalLeadershipDailyBusinessTips
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Over my 30+ years of being a top producer in sales and sales management and my 10+ years of being on Tony Robbins security team and his director of security, I've had the opportunity to meet some of the top leaders in the world who have accomplished things that had never been accomplished before. 

Voice of Personal Leadership: Daily Business Tips provides the key strategies to succeed, change your life and excel in leadership. 

Since surviving the "Miracle on the Hudson" crash, I've become a professional speaker, delivering my "Moments Matter" message to millions of people, including TEDx and many daytime morning shows and talk shows.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
